attributes.action: stop MP's having a vote on their own salary increases and instead peg all future increases to the same as a NHS staff nurse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's wrong, both for MP's and the public that they should have to determine and vote on their own cost of living increases each year.  It would be better if they automatically received the same pay increase as the most valued members of society who are paid out of the public purse.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
